rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the cost of PCR tests, however it's not clear whether you want free travel for those who have received a PCR test. It's also not clear whether you want those who have taken, or received a negative result from, a PCR test to be allowed to travel.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590483
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568602
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577612
